q1.question: 1. Does it work without Internet?
q1.answer: Yes. Technicians can work offline and once connectivity is restored, the app automatically syncs all updates.

q2.question: 2. What user levels exist?
q2.answer: We provide Supervisor, Technician and Manager roles, each with specific permissions and views.

q3.question: 3. How are alerts managed?
q3.answer: You can configure automatic alerts for safety conditions, delays or incidents. They are sent via push and remain logged.

q4.question: 4. Can I export reports?
q4.answer: Yes. Reports can be exported in PDF and Excel, with filters by dates, teams and statuses.

q5.question: 5. Can it integrate with other systems?
q5.answer: We provide API and integrations. We also assess custom integrations according to your existing systems.

q6.question: 6. Is training available for the team?
q6.answer: We include onboarding training and support materials. Additional sessions are available on demand.

what.title: Why was PetroTask created?
what.text1: PetroTask is a comprehensive digital transformation solution designed to optimize the planning, coordination, and supervision of logistics processes in operational areas that are difficult to access or highly complex, such as oil fields, mining operations, or remote energy facilities.
what.text2: Through the PetroTask platform, companies can centrally manage all logistics tasks: from creating and assigning activities to monitoring them in the field. This tool combines intuitive interfaces with technologies such as simulated IoT, real-time monitoring, and collaborative dashboards, providing complete visibility of the operation.

why.title: What is PetroTask?
why.text1: Industries operating in remote areas, such as mining, oil, or energy, face a series of complex logistical challenges on a daily basis. Hostile and unpredictable environments, changing weather conditions, technical equipment prone to failures, and the constant turnover of personnel make maintaining operational continuity a difficult task.
why.text2: This is further compounded by the lack of proper tools to provide traceability, real-time visibility, and truly adaptable planning.
why.text3: In this context, PetroTask was born as a response to the urgent need to organize operational chaos and provide a solution capable of centralizing logistics management, even in the most demanding scenarios.
